name: Gilead Sciences, Inc.
summary: Gilead Sciences, Inc. is a leading American biopharmaceutical company specializing in the research, development, and commercialization of antiviral drugs for diseases such as HIV/AIDS, hepatitis B and C, influenza, and COVID-19. Founded in 1987 and headquartered in Foster City, California, Gilead is publicly traded on the NASDAQ and operates globally, with a robust portfolio of innovative therapies and a significant presence in the pharmaceutical industry.
